description: [APT3](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0022) enables the Remote Desktop Protocol for persistence.(Citation: aptsim) [APT3](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0022) has also interacted with compromised systems to browse and copy files through RDP sessions.(Citation: Twitter Cglyer Status Update APT3 eml)

external_references.description: Glyer, C. (2018, April 14). @cglyer Status Update. Retrieved September 12, 2024.
external_references.source_name: Twitter Cglyer Status Update APT3 eml
